Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlMessages
@Generated(value={"RichFaces CDK","4.3.0.Final"})
public class UIRichMessages
extends AbstractMessages
implements org.ajax4jsf.component.AjaxOutput, ClientSideMessage

The <rich:messages> components works similarly to the <rich:message> component, but can display all the validation messages added for the current view instead of just a single message.

Author:
asmirnov@exadel.com
